alert.note: Alert for Deaf Smith; Oldham (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 08 at 3:34AM CST until January 09 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations up to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Deaf Smith and Oldham Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Visibilities may drop below 1/4 mile due to falling and blowing snow. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning and evening commutes. Strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. Notify a friend or family of your travel plans. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. Call 800-452-9292 for road information. Persons should consider delaying all travel. Motorists should use extreme caution if travel is absolutely necessary.
